metadata.title: Pribilof Island Ecosystem Data

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), Fisheries Oceanography Coordinated Investigations (FOCI)

metadata.description: Fisheries and plankton sampling around the Pribilof Islands during September 1994 to 1997.  Sampling mainly around hydrographic fronts and in the Pribilof Canyon.  Fisheries sampling includes bottom trawls, midwater anchovy trawls and methot trawls.  Plankton sampling includes Tucker trawls, bongo tows and MOCNESS tows.  Also have underwater video taken from an ROV.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To study the spring bloom and its relation to upper trophic levels, sampling mainly around hydrographic fronts and in the Pribilof Canyon.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Monthly

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
